goal.en: "First, the teaching objectives: At this era of democratic rule of law, legal literacy is a fundamental capability of modern citizen shall, in particular, has always been a school to train community leaders for the service, it should require its future decisions on the occasion of life skills, make good use of their legal speculative cultivation, therefore, by by this course students get a glimpse of the legal world in the leading edge, to serve its operations to understand and grasp of basic legal norms, and have the ability to resolve civil and criminal independent analysis of public law issues."
goal.ch: "一、教學目標： 處今民主法治時代，法律素養是現代公民應有的基本能力，尤其是本校向來以培養社會領導人才為務，更應要求其未來於處世決策之際，善用其法律思辨學養，因此，藉由本課程在使學生窺見法律世界堂奧，俾其理解掌握基本法律規範之運作，並具備獨立分析解決民刑公法議題的能力。"
